assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: Associations between building technology and design. The concept of design and architectural solution. Getting acquainted with sample designs and analysis in seminar format. Students complete, under supervision, an architectural rough plan of a building with wooden structure: letter of explanation,  site plan, ground plan, elevations, section, specification of materials. Finalizing and presentation.
description.et: Semestri jooksul toimub 10 ca 3 tunnist erineva lähteülesandega klausuuri, mille käigus skitseeritakse eskiisprojekt. Omandatakse hoone erinevate funktsioonide koostoimimise loogika, standartsete komponentide (mööbel, uksed, aknad, küttekolded) levinumad gabariidid, hoone vabakäelise visandamise proportsioonitunnetus, arhitektuurse graafika märgisüsteem.

objectives.en: Provide basic knowledge and skills of architectural design, and understanding of architect's way of thinking as well as methodologies.
objectives.et: Omandada veenev käeline skitseerimisoskus hoone eskiisprojekti koostamiseks.
